categories.title: Overview
categories.content: Ludwig JS is a badass CMS built on top of a suite of modern javascript frameworks.

categories.title: Requirements
categories.content: NodeJS ^= 9.x, Amazon Simple Email Service (SES), 1 Registered Domain, Knowledge of MySQL

categories.title: Installation
categories.content: Run the command npm run start-local

categories.title: Compatibility
categories.content: Ludwig JS can run on Mac, Windows and Linux
